item.title: The things they carried
item.description: Dipu Paruchal tilted his head back and surveyed the massive concrete structure resting on a pillar. This stretch of concrete pillars along the road leading up to Kota Damansara would soon be supporting an elevated MRT guideway. Sweat trickled down Dipuâ€™s forehead into his eyes. It stung. He blinked back the sweat and reached into the back pocket of his brown pants for a towel. As he took the towel out, a piece of paper fell out on the ground.
